mapper.select: SELECT UO.ORDER_ID, UO.ORDER_DATE, UO.ORDER_ADDR, UO.ORDER_ADDR_D ,UO.ORDER_ZIPCODE, UO.ORDER_RECEIVER, UO.ORDER_PHONE ,UO.ORDER_TOTAL, UO.USER_STATUS, UO.USER_ID ,UOD.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, UOD.USER_ORDER_CNT, UOD.PRODUCT_ID ,P.CATEGORY_CODE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_STOCK ,P.PRODUCT_INFO, P.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, P.PRODUCT_STATE ,UR.ORDER_DETAIL_ID ,UR.REFUND_ID, UR.REFUND_REASON, UR.REFUND_STATUS FROM USER_ORDER UO, USERORDER_DETAIL UOD, PRODUCT P, USERORDER_REFUND UR WHERE UO.ORDER_ID = UOD.ORDER_ID AND UOD.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND UOD.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = UR.ORDER_DETAIL_ID(+) AND UO.USER_ID = #{user_id}
